description: Sales support processes, email workflows, and request procedures

chunks.content: Submit credits to credits@driscollfoods.com (Wayne & PA DSMs). Credits must be submitted by the district manager to inside sales. Include: completed credit form, pictures of product, pick labels, manufacturer codes, identifying materials, signed invoice (from archive), and operational error email if applicable.

Credit submission requirements: completed credit form, product pictures (as many as possible), pick labels, manufacturer codes, other identifying materials, signed invoice (usually via archive). If credit results from operational error, include the ops error email.

Report operational errors to opserrors@driscollfoods.com. Subject line format: 'customer #; issue'. Include: customer name and number, order number, date, item code, route number, stop number, reason for error, and pictures if applicable.

Request product pickups via pickuprequest@driscollfoods.com. Include completed pickup form with: customer number, invoice number, original date, item number, item description, case count, total credit amount, reason for pickup, order number to attach request to, and driver instructions (who to ask for, key drop location, product location).

Perishable pickup policy: We will NOT pick up perishable items ordered in error - these must be refused at time of delivery. Exception: perishable meat items with quality issues will be picked up for inspection so customer doesn't have to hold them.
Dry and chemical item pickup policy: Will pick up within two weeks from invoice date. Submit request to pickuprequest@driscollfoods.com with completed pickup form.
Request new class bids via classbidrequest@driscollfoods.com. Inside sales sets up the bid; salesperson maintains it after creation. Class bids can hold multiple customers on a single bid.

Request PCM (Product Category Margin) setup via pcmrequest@driscollfoods.com. PCM assigns pricing headers by category - drill into subcategories and assign margins over sales cost. PCM is mandatory for customers using Cut & Dry (online ordering system).

Request order date changes or cancellations via orderchanges@driscollfoods.com. Include: customer name, customer/account number, order number, and new order date. Important: if canceling just-in-time items (cutshop & fishery), communicate directly with those departments.
Wayne routing requests: submit to routingrequest@driscollfoods.com for route changes or routing modifications.

Submit New Customer Alert (NCA) to ncarequests@driscollfoods.com for opening orders. Include: customer number, customer name, order number, delivery day, time window, and applicable notes. NCA flags the system for special care for 60 days. Critical: get delivery days and time window precisely correct.

Submit Critical Attention Request (CAR) to carrequests@driscollfoods.com for one-time special handling. Unlike NCA, CAR is a single-instance request for case-by-case special care. Include: customer number, name, order number, delivery day, time window, and applicable notes.

NCA vs CAR: NCA (New Customer Alert) flags account for 60 days of special care for new customers. CAR (Critical Attention Request) is a one-time request for special handling on a specific order/situation. Use NCA for new accounts, CAR for existing accounts needing one-time attention.

Request bill-to/ship-to arrangements via billtoshiptorequests@driscollfoods.com. Include: bill-to customer account number, ship-to customer number, delivery day, and order number if applicable. Important: ensure ship-to customer knows they will receive product that is not theirs.
Forced pickup requests: submit to forcedpickups@driscollfoods.com for mandatory product retrievals.
Wayne employee purchases: submit requests to employeepurchases@driscollfoods.com.

Driscoll Foods Sales Support Email Directory: Credits: credits@driscollfoods.com | Ops Errors: opserrors@driscollfoods.com | Pickups: pickuprequest@driscollfoods.com | Class Bids: classbidrequest@driscollfoods.com | PCM: pcmrequest@driscollfoods.com | Order Changes: orderchanges@driscollfoods.com | Routing (Wayne): routingrequest@driscollfoods.com | NCA: ncarequests@driscollfoods.com | CAR: carrequests@driscollfoods.com | Bill-to/Ship-to: billtoshiptorequests@driscollfoods.com | Forced Pickups: forcedpickups@driscollfoods.com | Employee Purchases (Wayne): employeepurchases@driscollfoods.com
